headline: Stock Market News for Jun 25, 2025
summary: U.S. stocks rallied on Tuesday, with crude prices falling for the second straight day, as investors welcomed a delicate ceasefire between Iran and Israel and also weighed Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell's testimony to get a clearer picture of the future rate-cut path.

raw.headline: Stock Market News for Jun 25, 2025

headline: United Mobile App Now Gives People More Information About Their Connecting Flight
summary: United is ready for peak summer travel season with the official launch of new, personalized mobile app features that make catching connecting flights easier.

headline: Q1 Earnings Outperformers: United Airlines (NASDAQ:UAL) And The Rest Of The Travel and Vacation Providers Stocks
summary: The end of the earnings season is always a good time to take a step back and see who shined (and who not so much). Let’s take a look at how travel and vacation providers stocks fared in Q1, starting with United Airlines (NASDAQ:UAL).
